subject: [Radiance-general] Re: obj2rad: "bad face" and "bad triangle"workaround
body:
Final note on this: if you don't want to run the bleeding edge version
of Radiance 4.0, make sure your obj2rad mapping file has a default
material and does not use "void".  As far as I can tell, those two
things will keep the bug from being tickled.

Randolph

On 2010-09-28 15:09:32 -0700, Randolph M. Fritz said:
